objects.description: [NavRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0247) leverages cmd.exe to perform discovery techniques.(Citation: Talos NavRAT May 2018) [NavRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0247) loads malicious shellcode and executes it in memory.(Citation: Talos NavRAT May 2018)

external_references.description: Mercer, W., Rascagneres, P. (2018, May 31). NavRAT Uses US-North Korea Summit As Decoy For Attacks In South Korea. Retrieved June 11, 2018.
